channel.title: MIDI Window :: Djazz
channel.description: Live Input View Scores View MIDI Out Bank Tracks View

item.title: MIDI Live Input View
item.description: You can record MIDI input into Djazz, and then inmprovise on the recorded input using all the effects and the improviser.

item.title: MIDI Scores View
item.description: Score Player/Loader Window MIDI scores are made up of multiple MIDI tracks.

item.title: MIDI Out Bank
item.description: The MIDI out bank contains 15 tracks output controls.

item.title: MIDI Tracks View
item.description: Track effects See effects . File/track info select Selecting either the folder button or the information (i) button will open the view to either load a track, or see the current playback data of the track.
